title: My Picture - "but my picture's picture be" means

content.prompt: By the expression "but my picture's picture be" (line 24), the speaker means that he will have

choices.label: proved that the picture does indeed represent him
moved toward the perfection of the picture
made himself a perfect replica of the picture
declined in vitality so that he is more lifeless than a picture

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
